name: Apollo 11 Virtual Museum
description:
This project is an early access virtual museum meant for educational purposes*. The museum takes you step by step through the course of the Apollo 11 mission, from the rocket that took the astronauts to the moon, down to the module that got them back. In this futuristic museum, holograms tell the story of the mission from start to finish, as well as having some actual objects from the Apollo 11 mission, including Neil Armstrong's spacesuit, and the spent command module the astronauts spent the majority of the mission in. The experience features these elements through use of the Smithsonian Digitization Program Office's photogrammetry and scan data used to capture these objects for virtual settings. This data can be found at their website here**.Feel free to download the game here. As I improve upon the project and eventually bring it out of this beta stage I will start moving to releasing the project on platforms like Steam and the Oculus Store. It will then and always be non-profit and free for download.

*Only compatible on Oculus Rift (S).

**Disclaimer and Terms of Use for Smithsonian Assets used
